author: Adam Wells
title: Former Nets Center Jason Collins Announces He Tested Positive for COVID-19
description: Former New Jersey/Brooklyn Nets center  Jason Collins    has become the latest athlete to test positive for the  coronavirus ...
content:
Kathy Kmonicek/Associated Press
Former New Jersey/Brooklyn Nets center Jason Collins has become the latest athlete to test positive for the coronavirus.
Collins announced Tuesday on Twitter that he tested positive for COVID-19 after first experiencing sympt… [+1836 chars]
